General.Name: Anhui Sierte Fertilizer Industry Ltd Co
General.Description: Anhui Sierte Fertilizer industry LTD. ,company produces and sells chemical fertilizers in China. It offers phosphate compound fertilizers, soil testing formula fertilizers, ecological fertilizers, and new fertilizers. The company also engages in the mining and sales of phosphate rock. Anhui Sierte Fertilizer industry LTD. ,company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Ningguo, China.
General.Address: Ningguo Eco & Tech Dev Zn, Ningguo, China
